sentences.sContent: The boy traded his knife for a cricket bat.
sentences.sContent_eng: The boy traded his knife for a cricket bat.
sentences.sCn: 那男孩用他的刀子换了一个板球棒。

sentences.sContent: He angrily stomped his cricket after failing the fight.
sentences.sContent_eng: He angrily stomped his cricket after failing the fight.
sentences.sCn: 比赛失败后，他生气地踏死了他的蟋蟀。

sentences.sContent: He was pressganged into playing in the charity cricket match.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was pressganged into playing in the charity cricket match.
sentences.sCn: 他是被强拉去参加这场板球义赛的。

trans.tranOther: a game between two teams of 11 players in which players try to get points by hitting a ball and running between two sets of three sticks
